'Today' is collection of classic songs by The Brooklyn Bridge and The Crests, as
well as other notable doo wop songs, that were re-recorded by the current line-
up of Johnny Maestro & The Brooklyn Bridge. The album was released on May 11,
2004 by Collectables Records. A follow-up titled [[Today, Volume 2 (Johnny
Maestro and The Brooklyn Bridge album)|Today, Volume 2]] was released in 2009.
categories: Johnny Maestro & The Brooklyn Bridge albums
